questionText.text: Who is known as the father of the computer?

quiz.instructionText: Select the correct answer and select Submit.

correctFbText.text: Correct: Charles Babbage is known as the father of the computer.

wrongFbText.text: Incorrect: The correct answer is Charles Babbage.

questionText.text: Which of the following are programming languages?

quiz.instructionText: Select all correct answers and select Submit.

correctFbText.text: Correct: Python and Java are programming languages.

wrongFbText.text: Incorrect: HTML is a markup language, and Photoshop is software.

questionText.text: HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language.

quiz.instructionText: Select True or False and select Submit.

correctFbText.text: Correct: HTML does stand for Hyper Text Markup Language.

wrongFbText.text: Incorrect: HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language.

questionText.text: Which company created the Android operating system?

quiz.instructionText: Select the correct answer and select Submit.

wrongFbText.text: Incorrect: The correct answer is Google.

questionText.text: Which devices are considered input devices?

quiz.instructionText: Select all correct answers and select Submit.

correctFbText.text: Correct: Keyboard and Mouse are input devices.

wrongFbText.text: Incorrect: Monitor and Printer are output devices.

questionText.text: Wi-Fi uses radio waves to provide internet access.

quiz.instructionText: Select True or False and select Submit.

correctFbText.text: Correct: Wi-Fi transmits data via radio waves.

wrongFbText.text: Incorrect: Wi-Fi uses radio waves, not wires.

quiz.instructionText: Select the correct answer and select Submit.

correctFbText.text: Correct: CPU stands for Central Processing Unit.

wrongFbText.text: Incorrect: The correct answer is Central Processing Unit.

questionText.text: Which of the following are web browsers?

quiz.instructionText: Select all correct answers and select Submit.

correctFbText.text: Correct: Google Chrome and Firefox are web browsers.

wrongFbText.text: Incorrect: Windows Explorer is a file manager, Slack is a communication tool.

questionText.text: Blockchain is the technology behind cryptocurrencies.

quiz.instructionText: Select True or False and select Submit.

correctFbText.text: Correct: Blockchain enables secure and decentralized transactions.

wrongFbText.text: Incorrect: Blockchain is the core technology behind cryptocurrencies.

questionText.text: Which programming language is primarily used for web development?

quiz.instructionText: Select the correct answer and select Submit.

correctFbText.text: Correct: JavaScript is widely used for building web applications.

wrongFbText.text: Incorrect: JavaScript is the primary language for web development.
